title: Wall of text!
comment: Needs to display new lines, needs a clear screen button. Dump to text file would be nice

title: FTDI USB-to-serial Driver
comment: Would it be really difficult to connect Arduino with FTDI chip to Android?

title: Great job!
comment: We need more supportive people making apps like this!

title: Excellent job
comment: i have been searching for this type of app for my research project for a long time. Thanks a lot

title: Treat
comment: Works a treat as arduino serial monitor but I havent made an app to transmit data from my phone to arduino.  Is their a help forum for that?

title: Great app!
comment: This is a really cool app! I think the best part is that the author has made the code publicly available to so people can modify the app to their liking. Thanks for putting in the work! I will be adding extra functionality to this app based on your work.

title: Please add text output
comment: That's a good app no doubt but please add text mode too as hex output is not always very meaningful.

title: won't talk to my netduino
comment: I downloaded it hoping it would talk to my netduino over usb. The OS (android ICS) sees the device. Any chance of adding a driver for this usb?
